info.name: General API
info.description: This needs to be documented. Adding so we do not forget to publish it.

item.name: Health

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/ping](https://developers.circle.com/reference/ping)

#### Description

Checks that the service is running.

item.description: Get updates on the status of Circle's APIs.

item.name: Management

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/getconfig](https://developers.circle.com/reference/getconfig)

#### Description

Retrieves general configuration information.

item.description: Get information on your Circle Account configurations.

item.name: Encryption

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/getpublickey](https://developers.circle.com/reference/getpublickey)

#### Description

Retrieves an RSA public key to be used in encrypting data sent to the API. Your public keys change infrequently, so we encourage you to cache this response value locally for a duration of 24 hours or more.

item.description: Get a public key for data encryption.

item.name: Subscriptions

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/listsubscriptions](https://developers.circle.com/reference/listsubscriptions)

#### Description

Retrieve a list of existing notification subscriptions with details.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/subscribe](https://developers.circle.com/reference/subscribe)

#### Description

Subscribe to receiving notifications at a given endpoint. The endpoint should be able to handle AWS SNS subscription requests. For more details see [https://docs.aws.amazon.com/mobile/sdkforxamarin/developerguide/sns-send-http.html](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/mobile/sdkforxamarin/developerguide/sns-send-http.html). Note, the sandbox environment allows a maximum of 3 active subscriptions; otherwise, this is limited to 1 active subscription and subsequent create requests will be rejected with a Limit Exceeded error.

#### Body Params

**endpoint** *string* (REQUIRED)  
URL of the subscriber endpoint. Must be publicly accessible and utilize HTTPS.

#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/unsubscribe](https://developers.circle.com/reference/unsubscribe)

#### Description

To remove a subscription, all its subscription requests' statuses must be either 'confirmed', 'deleted' or a combination of those. A subscription with at least one 'pending' subscription request cannot be removed.

item.description:
Create, get information on, or delete subscriptions for AWS SNS Notifications.

For more information, see this quickstart guide.

[https://developers.circle.com/docs/notifications-quickstart](https://developers.circle.com/docs/notifications-quickstart)

item.name: Channels

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/listchannels](https://developers.circle.com/reference/listchannels)

#### Description

Retrieve a list of channels with details (e.g. `cardDescriptor`, `achDescriptor`, etc.).

item.description: Get information on payment channels configured for your Circle Account.

item.name: Stablecoins

request.description:
#### Reference Pages

[https://developers.circle.com/reference/getstablecoins](https://developers.circle.com/reference/getstablecoins)

#### Description

Retrieves total circulating supply for supported stablecoins across all chains. This endpoint is rate limited to one call per minute (based on IP).

item.description: Get a list of supported stablecoins and the associated circulating supplies.
